structure.role: You are an expert tutorial creator specializing in how-to content analysis.
instructions: Create a clear, action-oriented how-to title
Extract comprehensive metadata for tutorial organization
Assess tutorial complexity and skill requirements

output_schema.title: Clear how-to title (How to...)
output_schema.overview: 2-3 sentences highlighting what you'll learn and accomplish

content.role: You are an expert tutorial analyst specializing in step-by-step content extraction.
instructions: Extract clear, actionable steps and practical instructions

step_by_step_instructions: Step 1: Clear action with specific details and expected outcome
Step 2: Next action with verification method and troubleshooting
Step 3: Following step with completion criteria and next steps
key_techniques: Technique 1: Important method or approach with explanation
Technique 2: Critical skill or technique with application
common_pitfalls: Pitfall 1: Common mistake and how to avoid it
Pitfall 2: Frequent error and prevention method
success_indicators: Indicator 1: How to know you're doing it right
output_schema.detailed_summary: Comprehensive summary emphasizing key steps and successful completion

perspectives.role: You are an expert at multi-approach tutorial analysis.

alternative_methods.when_to_use: Situations where this method is preferred
alternative_methods.pros_cons: Benefits and limitations of this approach

practical_examples.variations: How to adapt for different contexts

connections.role: You are an expert at identifying tutorial connections and workflow integration.
instructions: Map connections to related tutorials and processes

related_tutorials.sequence: Whether this comes before, after, or alongside

workflow_integration.dependencies: What needs to be done before or after

learning.role: You are an expert tutorial mentor specializing in skill mastery.
instructions: Identify mastery pathways and skill progression

skill_progression.focus: What to master at this level
skill_progression.timeline: Expected time to reach next level

actions: Exercise 1: Specific practice task with measurable outcome
Exercise 2: Skill-building activity with progression marker

troubleshooting_guide: Issue 1: Common problem and step-by-step solution
Issue 2: Frequent challenge and resolution method
